name: Chicken Chaos
description:
Chicken Chaos,

Defeat the Chefs, before you get cooked! 

This is my first games, Hope you like it!

How to play :

CONTROL :

(Player Movement)

A/Left Arrow - Turn Left

D/Right Arrow - Turn Right

SPACE - Jump

Right Click - Shoot

("Defeat all the wave, and make the chefs regret it!")

Im Dustion ( A Solo Developer )
